alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Evangeline; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 7:41PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL EVANGELINE... SOUTHERN AVOYELLES AND NORTH CENTRAL ST. LANDRY PARISHES THROUGH 815 PM CDT... At 741 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Whiteville, or near Morrow, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Opelousas, Ville Platte, Morrow, Washington, Whiteville, Big Cane, Goudeau, Prairie Ronde, and Grand Prairie. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 23 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
